solution_line_template: A single layer of each wall requires {rows_per_wall} rows * {bricks_per_row} bricks per row = <<{rows_per_wall}*{bricks_per_row}={bricks_per_layer}>>{bricks_per_layer} bricks.

As each wall has a thickness of {depth_bricks} bricks, he will need {bricks_per_layer} bricks * {depth_bricks} = <<{bricks_per_layer}*{depth_bricks}={bricks_per_wall}>>{bricks_per_wall} bricks per wall.
If the complete fence contains four walls, he will require a total of {bricks_per_wall}*{num_walls}=<<{bricks_per_wall}*{num_walls}={total_bricks}>>{total_bricks} bricks.
